sentences.english: In the selling expenses control, the travel expense how to limit and so on.
sentences.chinese: 銷售費用控制中，差旅費如何界定等。

sentences.english: The company will remunerate you for your travelling expenses.
And will Maria pay for the trip?
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗亞會給你報銷旅費嗎？

sentences.english: They had no money to travel and hadn’t seen each other in almost two years.
sentences.chinese: 由於沒錢支付旅費，他們彼此已有兩年沒見面了。

sentences.english: The salesman padded the bill for his traveling expenses by exaggerating his food expenses.
sentences.chinese: 那位推銷員誇大伙食費用以此浮報差旅費。

sentences.english: Take out pen and pad and decide how much you can spend.
sentences.chinese: 拿出紙和筆，算算你準備花多少旅費。

sentences.english: Participants in the high-power group considered the misreporting of travel expenses to be a significantly worse offense.
sentences.chinese: 高權力組成員認爲虛報差旅費是一種相當嚴重的過錯。

sentences.english: The accounting department will reimburse you for all your meals and travel expenses.
sentences.chinese: 財務部門會報銷所有的餐費和差旅費。

sentences.english: In Charon's palm it pay the toll to Death.
sentences.chinese: 在擺渡人的掌中支付了通向死亡的旅費。

sentences.english: How much petty cash do we have left after paying for the trip to the conference?
sentences.chinese: 在支付完去研討會的旅費後，我們還剩下多少零用金？

sentences.english: The last week of the month would also be sensational for travel, near or far.
sentences.chinese: 最後一週至本月底也將聳人聽聞的旅費，或近或遠。

sentences.english: All the travelling expenses will be borne by the host country.
Yesterday afternoon the comptroller's office reimbursed me for the traveling expenses.
sentences.chinese: 昨天下午學校會計處把我旅費補送來了。

sentences.english: They will defray the cost of my trip if I do them a favor.
sentences.chinese: 如果我幫他們忙，他們願付我的旅費。

sentences.english: This Delay Reasons Report should be attached to the Expenses Report of business trip.
sentences.chinese: 本表請並同出差旅費報告書覈銷。

sentences.english: If we could afford it, we'd like to go abroad for our holidays.
sentences.chinese: 如果出得起旅費，我們想到國外去度假。

definition: to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
to submit an expense account/to apply for reimbursement/to write off/to wipe out
